scripts.start: npm run start-db && npm run migrate-db && postgraphile --cors -c postgres://nd_postgraphile:Abcd1234@localhost:5433/nd -s nd,nd_private --default-role nd_anonymous --secret nd_keyboard_kitten --token nd.jwt_token --include-extension-resources true
scripts.start-local: postgraphile -c postgres://forum_example_postgraphile:xyz@localhost:5432/nd -s forum_example,forum_example_private --default-role forum_example_anonymous --secret nd_keyboard_kitten --token forum_example.jwt_token --include-extension-resources true
